text:
[Verse]
Lights are out go boom boom
Heart beats fast in the room
Music loud and I assume
We can dance all night soon

[Verse 2]
Mirror ball on the ceiling
Feeling high no healing
Lost in the bass so appealing
My feet touch the floor kneeling

[Chorus]
Dancing alone tonight
Feel the rhythm take flight
Under the stars so bright
Lose myself in the light

[Verse 3]
Eyes closed world spins around
In this beat we are bound
Every move without a sound
Where the melodies are found

[Bridge]
Claps echo in the dark
Every step leaves a mark
In the night we embark
On this journey like a spark

[Chorus]
Dancing alone tonight
Feel the rhythm take flight
Under the stars so bright
Lose myself in the light
title: Dancing Alone
